Working under the supervision of the Geographical Information System (GIS) Supervisor and as an integral part of the GIS Team, the GIS Assistant performs a variety of technical assignments while gaining relevant GIS experience including data management and map creation providing support to other CVRD divisions and public enquiries. The GIS Team deals with a wide range of subject matter such as planning, solid waste & recycling, utilities, emergency management, environmental services and parks. Hours of Work This position is available for a period of 17 weeks commencing May 4, 2026 and continuing until August 28, 2026, subject to funding. Hours of work are 35 hours per week, Monday to Friday. Salary This temporary position is unionized (CUPE Local 358), and is compensated at $25.32 per hour. Additionally, this position will receive 14.5% in lieu of benefits, statutory holidays and vacation, bringing the compensation to $28.99 per hour.
